CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName $(PRODUCT_NAME) CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString $(MARKETING_VERSION) CFBundleURLTypes
CFBundleTypeRole Editor CFBundleURLName $(PRODUCT_NAME) CFBundleURLSchemes
$(APP_URL_SCHEME) #ifdef INTUNE $(APP_URL_SCHEME)-intunemam #endif
#ifdef INTUNE
CFBundleTypeRole Viewer CFBundleURLName $(PRODUCT_NAME) CFBundleURLSchemes
msauth.com.microsoft.intunemam msauth.$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
#endif
CFBundleVersion $(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION) #ifdef INTUNE IntuneMAMSettings
AppGroupIdentifiers
group.com.keepassium.intune
ADALClientId 292a80b3-139a-4165-a20d-b2d2e764e538 ADALRedirectUri msauth.com.keepassium.intune://auth DebugSettingsEnabled
SplashDuration 1.5 MaxFileProtectionLevel NSFileProtectionComplete VerboseLoggingEnabled
MAMTelemetryDisabled
SafariViewControllerBlockedOverride
#endif LSApplicationCategoryType public.app-category.productivity LSApplicationQueriesSchemes
mailto http itms-apps https ftp #ifdef INTUNE msauthv2 msauthv3 mailto-intunemam ms-outlook-intunemam http-intunemam itms-apps-intunemam https-intunemam ftp-intunemam microsoft-edge-https microsoft-edge-http ms-outlook companyportal smart-ns zips lacoonsecurity wandera lookoutwork-ase skycure betteractiveshield smsec mvisionmobile scmx #endif
LSRequiresIPhoneOS
LSSupportsOpeningDocumentsInPlace
NFCReaderUsageDescription KeePassium needs access to NFC to communicate with your YubiKey. NSAppTransportSecurity
NSAllowsLocalNetworking
NSCameraUsageDescription KeePassium needs the camera to scan QR codes. NSFaceIDUsageDescription Use FaceID to unlock KeePassium NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription KeePassium needs permission to export files to your Photo Library. UIFileSharingEnabled
UILaunchStoryboardName LaunchScreen UIRequiredDeviceCapabilities
armv7
UISupportedExternalAccessoryProtocols
com.yubico.ylp
UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown

UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight
UISupportsDocumentBrowser
